details:
Dovecot reports:

> If two users with the same password and same pass\_filter
> variables log in within auth\_cache\_ttl seconds (1h by default),
> the second user may get logged in with the first user's cached
> pass\_attrs. For example if pass\_attrs contained the user's
> home/mail directory, this would mean that the second user will
> be accessing the first user's mails.
summary: dovecot -- Specific LDAP + auth cache configuration may mix up user logins
